TopicTitle: Realism overhaul with RSS - bugged runway?

Articles.Content:
I got RSS and realism overhaul with tons of other mods and I got problem with the runway. In sandbox mode it says that maximum span and lenght of aircraft is -1, so every plane I built is to large.

Any ideas?

Happened to me too, after an Update of RP0 (Nathan?).

Solution for me was:

edit CustomBarnkit.cfg

There u ll find craftSizeLimitSPH

Rest is up to u ;-)
This is fixed in git; there will be a release shortly.
